Tests interception blocking, modification of network fetches.
Test started
Network agent enabled
Request interception enabled
Page agent enabled
Runtime agent enabled

  responseStatusCode: undefined
  responseHeaders: <None>
RequestWillBeSent Event fired for url: ping-redirect.php
  responseBody:
    error: Can only get response body on HeadersReceived pattern matched requests.
Continue request unchanged.

Request Intercepted: ping-redirect.php
  responseStatusCode: undefined
  responseHeaders: <None>
  redirectUrl: ping-redirected-page.html
  redirectHeaders:
    Date: <Masked>
    Server: <Masked>
    X-Powered-By: <Masked>
    Expires: <Masked>
    Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate
    Pragma: no-cache
    Location: ping-redirected-page.html
    Content-Length: 0
    Keep-Alive: <Masked>
    Connection: Keep-Alive
    Content-Type: text/html
  redirectStatusCode: 307
  responseBody:
    error: Can only get response body on HeadersReceived pattern matched requests.
Modifying request with new body.
